title: Ideal Vikt Kalkylator
description: Beräkna your ideal weight using multiple scientific formulas
metaDescription: Gratis ideal weight calculator - Beräkna your ideal weight baserat på height and gender using multiple formulas: Robinson, Miller, Devine, and Hamwi.

results.title: Din Ideal Vikt
results.healthyRangeDesc: Based on a healthy BMI of 18.5 - 25

info.title: Om the Ideal Vikt Kalkylator
info.description: This calculator estimates your ideal weight baserat på din längd and gender using four recognized scientific formulas: Robinson (1983), Miller (1983), Devine (1974), and Hamwi (1964). It also calculates a healthy weight range baserat på the Kropp Massa Index (BMI) recommended by WHO.
info.robinsonFormula:
Män: 52 kg + 1.9 kg per inch over 5 feet
Kvinnor: 49 kg + 1.7 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.millerFormula:
Män: 56.2 kg + 1.41 kg per inch over 5 feet
Kvinnor: 53.1 kg + 1.36 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.devineFormula:
Män: 50 kg + 2.3 kg per inch over 5 feet
Kvinnor: 45.5 kg + 2.3 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.hamwiFormula:
Män: 48 kg + 2.7 kg per inch over 5 feet
Kvinnor: 45.5 kg + 2.2 kg per inch over 5 feet
info.limitations: These formulas provide general estimates of ideal weight. Actual ideal weight may vary baserat på body composition, bone structure, muscle mass, and other individual factors. Consult with a healthcare professional for a personalized assessment.
